name: OR Switch Check
description: Sets the local variable specified in V1 if any of the local variables specified in V2, V3, V4, or V5 are set.

fields.name: Triggered Local Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that is triggered or set by this actor.

fields.name: Checked Local Variable 1
fields.description: A local variable number that is checked by this actor.

fields.name: Checked Local Variable 2
fields.description: A local variable number that is checked by this actor.

fields.name: Checked Local Variable 3
fields.description: A local variable number that is checked by this actor.

fields.name: Checked Local Variable 4
fields.description: A local variable number that is checked by this actor.

4.name: Trigger when v2, v3, v4, or v5 is set
4.description: Trigger occurs when any of V2, V3, V4, or V5 is set.
